schema.description: Can be string **today** or Time in %s format! Example for 2020-04-29 11:50:27 +02:00

parameters.description: get meetings only ends in this time

location.description: room name or just location of meeting

color.description: internal use - color of meeting in `easy_calendar`

bigRecurringChildren.description: Meeting is recurrent - this is repeated meeting of `parent`
